description: This file defines a React functional component named SettingsPanel that displays a user interface for adjusting application settings such as theme and font. It includes state management with useState and handles user interactions for changing settings and saving them.

methods.name: SettingsPanel({ settings, onChange, onSave })
methods.description: React functional component for rendering and managing user settings input fields, including toggles and text inputs, with a save button.

ctags.name: SettingsPanel
ctags.pattern: /^export default function SettingsPanel({ settings, onChange, onSave }) {$/
